MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL13 and LL14 postcode areas of Wrexham, affecting properties in Wynnstay Hall Estate, Pen Y Lan, Overton Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:29pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:26pm on 23rd March 2021.
